name: Last.fm - Yale Blue Style (2011-02-06)
description:
Very much based on this here: http://userstyles.org/styles/34973
Best used with "Paint It Black" theme (I was to lazy to adjust for both and black and blue looks better mostly).

Updates:
2011-01-21 - some little fixes
2011-01-30 - fixed "on tour" link color
2011-02-06 - repaired the style
